name: ancient-refs
description: Multi-storage ids syntax, parse and get methods.
author: Ivan S Glazunov <ivansglazunov@gmail.com>

scripts.jsdoc: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ./doc && git checkout gh-pages && cd ../ && npm i && rm -r ./doc/*/ && find ./doc ! -name '.git' -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && jsdoc ./*.js ./README.md -r -d ./doc -t ./node_modules/minami -c ./jsdoc.conf.json
